author: abayer
msg: Maven pushes sqoop jar and shim jars.
Renamed shim jar files to conform to maven artifact-version naming.

author: abayer
msg: Add 'release' target for one-step full build.

author: abayer
msg: Add webdocs target to build release docs website.

author: abayer
msg: bin/configure-sqoop now puts the 'conf' directory on the classpath.
Users can override this by setting $SQOOP_CONF_DIR.
Added src/perftest/ExtConnFactoryTest and ExtFactory, that demonstrates
the configuration is being correctly read.
